alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Florence, north central Georgetown, southwestern Horry, south central Marion and east central Williamsburg Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pee Dee Crossroads, or 11 miles west of Conway, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conway, Horry, Hemingway, Hickory Grove, Rhems, Galivants Ferry, Homewood, Adrian, Pee Dee Crossroads, Nesmith, Brittons Neck, Dongola, Outland, Bayboro, Henry and Aynor. This includes SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Florence; Inland Georgetown; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
